name: python-fastapi
additionalInstructions: List ALL route handlers with: HTTP method (@app.get/@router.post/etc.), path, line number
For each route: document request model (Pydantic schema), response model, status codes
Identify dependency injection functions (Depends()) and what they provide
Note background tasks (BackgroundTasks) if used and what they do
Note path parameters, query parameters, and body parameters
Identify security dependencies (OAuth2, API keys, etc.)
Document response_model settings and status_code overrides
